fields.summary: Android: Tabs don't fire click events

fields.description:
{html}

1.Fire up KS on an android device
2.tap the tabs and notice the alerts
3.use the nav stick and nav between the tabs

results: when using the D/Pad or Trackball, the tabs change by the alerts (triggered by the click event) do not seem to be fired off.

{html}
fields.summary: Android: tabGroup tab click event not triggered by stick nav on main tab of KS

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
